page.title: 134C's and Monkton
page.content: The 4C's and Monkton are buildings having facilities for the clubs that younger and older people like. The 4C's has a few activities such as badminton, tennis, swimming and squash. It is also a nightclub, one night for teenagers and all the rest of the nights are for over eighteens. The Monkton is similar but has a lot more clubs there. Here are some of them: tennis, badminton, table tennis, squash, football, darts and golf. Some of the clubs were set up for younger children to help stop them getting bored in the holidays and at weekends. A lot of children attend these clubs and enjoy the indoor and outdoor facilities.
